caption: The FBI raided the CDC in the middle of the night to seize data on a link between vaccines and autism.

result.explanation: The image shows the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) building.  The caption mentions the FBI raiding the CDC, which is not depicted in the image. The image only shows the exterior of the building. There is no visual evidence of an FBI raid.

candidates.title: Did the FBI Raid the CDC for Data on Vaccines and Autism?
candidates.content:
This morning President Trump ordered the CDC Headquarters in Atlanta to be raided at 3:00 Am Their Time.
Although Unconfirmed the CDC did tell me on the phone a few minutes ago: "We Are Not Allowed To Comment On That.Please Email me and we will give you a statement about it. "
I also had 36 Posts on my video 10 minutes before it was posted...
Long before the Employees began showing up to work the FBI was busting down doors and seizing computers.
Accompanying these FBI Agents was Dr William Thompson  who is a CDC Whistle Blower.
The raid was ordered by the President and was led by Sally Yates - Acting Attorney General and part of the King and Spalding Law Group, which was also working with President Trumps huge law firm: Jones Day.
All of the records for the Vaccines - what is in them, what they have done to people across the globe - it is all being seized as you read this.
As soon as President Obama took office he granted both the CDC and Monsanto protection in their massive use of GMO Foods and Vaccines to kill people world wide. That protection is now gone. The employees involved in murder and disabling people world wide have two choices: Become a whistle blower or face 20 years to life in prison.
There is no place you can hide on this planet or in this planet.
So what is in Vaccines that make them so deadly???
Of the 202 children we have worked with 2 were autistic due to Vaccines given to the Mothers while she was in the military. The other 200 became autistic the day they were vaccinated and all have Indigo Aura ... Those with Chrystaline Auras were killed outright. This author has a Chrystaline Aura.
candidates.description: A known hoax purveyor spread false claims the FBI "raided" the CDC in the middle of the night for data on vaccines and autism on the order of President Trump.

result.explanation: The claim is explicitly debunked by a fact-checking website (Snopes). The article details how a hoax purveyor spread false claims about an FBI raid on the CDC to seize data on a link between vaccines and autism.  The article's content directly refutes the news caption's assertion.
result.supporting_points: Source 1 (Snopes):  "A known hoax purveyor spread false claims the FBI "raided" the CDC in the middle of the night for data on vaccines and autism on the order of President Trump."

final_result.explanation: Both internal and external validation checks strongly indicate that the caption is out of context. The internal check finds no evidence of an FBI raid in the image, which only shows the exterior of the CDC building.  The confidence score for this is 10, reflecting absolute certainty based on the visual evidence.  The external check uses Snopes, a reputable fact-checking website, to confirm that the claim of an FBI raid on the CDC to seize data on a link between vaccines and autism is a hoax. Snopes directly refutes the caption's assertion, providing a confidence score of 10.  There is perfect agreement between the internal and external checks.  Both checks point to the caption's falsity with high confidence. The image depicts the CDC building, while the caption describes a non-existent event. There's no ambiguity; the image shows only a building, and the caption describes a specific event (an FBI raid) which is factually incorrect according to the external validation.  No further analysis or reconciliation is necessary, as both validation methods concur completely and decisively.
final_result.validation_summary: Both internal and external checks decisively confirm that the caption is out of context. The image shows the CDC building, but the caption falsely describes an FBI raid and the acquisition of data linking vaccines to autism.  The external source, Snopes, directly debunks this claim.
